TITLE: Schedule Comments - FastComments
HEADING: Schedule Comments
DESCRIPTION_PART1: Here you can schedule comments to be automatically posted, live, over time. This can allow you to annotate pages, like webinars, or even kick off discussion on a page for a live event in an automated way.
DESCRIPTION_PART2: This is done by importing comments using the supported CSV Format (example here).
DESCRIPTION_SCHEDULING_TYPES: There are two types of scheduling. The first is that the comments start playing on every page load, which is when "Every Page Load" is selected, and the second type is manually scheduling the comments by coming here and clicking "start".
AUTO_PLAY_WARNING: Note! Adding Auto-Play comments (by selecting "Every Page Load" below) will cause any new comments posted in an autoplay thread to be added to the autoplay script. The comments can be moderated via the Moderate Comments page.
REPLAY_NAME_HELP: You can name your imports to easily find them later.
MANUAL_SAME_TIME: Manually, Same Time for All Users
INPUT_FILE_LABEL: Input File (Drag and Drop or Click to Upload)
MANUAL_CONFIRMATION_NOTE: If you selected Manual above, we'll wait for your confirmation to start playing back comments. You'll receive an email notifying you when it's ready to play. Otherwise, comments will auto play every time a user loads the page.
REFRESH_FOR_STATUS: Refresh the page to get the latest status.
NO_IMPORTS: You don't have any pending or past scheduled comment imports.
